Generation IX.Scarlet: The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.
Generation IX.Violet: The green head has turned vicious due to the spicy chemicals stimulating its brain. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
